settings.title: Title

settings.content_3:

settings.text: The perfect blend of rider, art, and craftsmanship.

settings.content: We believe that every product we design needs to first consider who the consumer is and what suits them best.

settings.title: EB5 Preferred City Commuter
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series returns to our roots, celebrating our tradition of expertise in urban commuting. With its advanced lighting configuration and breakthrough features, it heralds a new era of safe and convenient urban travel.

settings.title: Design
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series is innovative in both style and function, seamlessly integrating aesthetics and utility through its unique lighting setup (including turn signals, brake lights, rear tail lights, and front headlights). Its lighting system is designed for high performance, enhancing visibility and safety during night rides, ensuring seamless navigation in urban environments.

settings.title: Craftsmanship
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series is meticulously crafted, with attention to detail and precision, reflecting our unwavering commitment to quality and innovation. Every component is rigorously designed to deliver a bicycle that not only meets but exceeds the expectations of urban commuters.

settings.title: Finished Product
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer series represents the pinnacle of excellent urban commuting. With its cutting-edge features and stylish design, it seamlessly integrates safety, convenience, and performance. Ride confidently and elegantly with the EB5 Roamer series, rediscovering the essence of urban commuting in an unparalleled way.

settings.title: 850W Powerful Motor
settings.content: Maximize performance with our 850W robust motors—your key to thrilling rides.

settings.title: 48V/10Ah Battery
settings.content: Utilizing the newly developed 21700 battery cells from Samsung SDI. Removable for charging and holds UL 2271 international certification.

settings.title: Dual Suspension
settings.content: Front and rear manually adjustable damping shock absorption system crafted from high-durability materials. Conquer any terrain with confidence, providing a stable and comfortable ride in any scenario.

settings.title: Powerful Performance, Effortlessly Conquer Commuting Challenges
settings.content: Equipped with a powerful 1400W motor, it delivers up to 60Nm of torque in just 2 seconds at the 5th gear setting, accelerating quickly to tackle steep slopes with ease. The sine wave controller ensures smooth and quiet motor operation, allowing you to adjust speed from gears 1 to 5 flexibly. Enjoy a personalized riding experience that makes each journey more comfortable and effortless.

settings.subheading: International Certification for Flame and Explosion Resistance
settings.title: Stick to Whole Week
settings.content: Featuring the newly developed 18650 battery cells from Samsung SDI, each lithium-ion single cell has a diameter of 18 millimeters and a length of 65 millimeters, combined to form a 48V11A configuration. Jasion Bike utilizes a spring-loaded, quickly detachable sealed design, achieving an IPX-6 waterproof rating. The battery is removable for charging.

Assist Mode: Effortless walking and pushing the bike without exertion.
Sport Mode: Enhanced torque for quick acceleration and higher power output.
Pedal Assist Mode: Easier pedaling while still enjoying the fun of cycling.
Pure Electric Mode: No need to pedal; control the speed using electronic controls.

settings.title: Powerful Lighting Setup: Ride Safely and Confidently at Night.
settings.content: EB5 Roamer is equipped with a powerful lighting system, including left and right turn signals, brake lights, rear tail lights, and front lights. Jasion's exclusive design of left and right turn signals is not found in other electric bikes on the market. When a turn is needed, simply gently activate the turn signal button on the handlebars to let vehicles behind you know your turning intention, thereby safeguarding your commuting safety. Even if the lighting system is not in use, the left and right turn signals can remain active, ensuring you receive consistent warnings and protection throughout your journey.

settings.subheading: The Front Fork is Adjustable for Shock Absorption.
settings.title: High-Intensity Front Fork Suspension: Ensuring a Stable and Comfortable Ride.
settings.content: Featuring an 80mm travel for effective shock absorption, the front fork is made from high-durability materials. It offers the flexibility of manual adjustment between two states: locking the front fork for stability and adapting to the road conditions.

settings.title: Front and Rear Lights, Brake Lights, Left and Right Turn Signals
settings.content: The powerful lighting system enhances the safety of your urban commuting experience, equipped with high-brightness LEDs and a left-right turn signal design. This not only ensures your safety during nighttime travel but also aims to make your presence more secure and visible

settings.title: Reflective Spoke Strips
settings.content: Paired with front and rear puncture-resistant tires, equipped with reflective strips on the tire hubs, ensuring your travels are safer. Even in darkness, passing vehicles can easily notice your presence.

settings.title: High-Intensity Front Fork Suspension
settings.content: Equipped with an 80mm travel front fork suspension that can be manually adjusted for hardness or softness, catering to the demands of different road surfaces

settings.title: Shimano 7-speed & Thumb-activated Throttle
settings.content: The bike is equipped with a Shimano 7-speed gear shifter and a thumb-activated throttle on the right handlebar. The Shimano 7-speed allows you to experience various cycling pleasures, while the thumb-activated throttle provides precise control over the electric current, enabling accurate speed modulation.

settings.title: Lighting & Speed Control
settings.content: The left side of the bicycle handlebar is equipped with the electronic control system, featuring a durable and convenient mechanical design. It allows adjustment of gears from 1 to 5, as well as control over lighting, horn, and left-right turn signals.

settings.title: Chain Mudguard Protector
settings.content: Chain Guard, designed to shield the chain from rainwater and mud, preventing dirt from splashing onto the chain. It also serves to protect your pants or skirt from getting stained by chain oil.

settings.title: Quick Detachable Battery
settings.content: The battery features a spring-loaded quick-release technology, allowing for swift detachment from the bicycle for convenient portable charging and fast installation. The sealed structure enhances its durability

settings.title: Headlight&Taillight
settings.content: Brighter LED headlights, make riding more convenient and safer. The integrated taillight will flash when brake, making it a warning light at night.

settings.title: The Main Features
settings.content: "More detailed feature introduction for the EB5 Roamer Electric Bicycle."

settings.item13: Rear Light  Left and Right Turn Signal Brake Lights

settings.title: Assembly Instruction
settings.content: Get ready to hit the road with your EB5 Roamer! Our installation guide video will walk you through each step of the assembly process, making it quick and hassle-free. From unboxing to final adjustments, you'll be cruising in no time. Let's dive in and make your EB5 Roamer ready for your next adventure! For the user Manual, please click HERE.

settings.title: First-of-Its-Kind Turn Signals Designed
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer boasts a powerful lighting configuration that includes left and right turn signals, brake lights, rear taillights, and front headlights. These high-performance lights ensure enhanced visibility and safety during nighttime rides, allowing you to navigate your surroundings with ease. Jasion's exclusive design of the left and right turn signals distinguishes it from other electric bikes on the market, marking a pioneering achievement. With the simple flick of a switch on the handlebars, you can signal your intentions to people behind you, further safeguarding your commuting experience. Even when the lighting system is inactive, the left and right turn signals can still remain illuminated, providing an added layer of awareness and protection throughout your journey.

settings.title: EB5 Roamer Features
settings.content: The EB5 Roamer features a robust lighting system, comprising left and right turn signals, brake lights, rear taillights, and front headlights, ensuring your safety during urban commuting. With an 1100W high-power motor and 60 Nm torque, the EB5 Roamer reaches speeds of up to 28 miles per hour, covering an impressive range of 50 miles, making it perfect for commuting. Plus, with its fast charging technology, the battery can be fully charged in just 4-5 hours. You can conveniently start charging the battery when you return home after your daily commute. By the time you finish dinner and prepare for bed, the battery is fully charged and ready for your next adventure.

settings.title: EB5 Roamer New Configuration
settings.content: Unlike the EB7 and X-Hunter, the EB5 Roamer prioritizes urban commuting. Its newly added left and right turn signals are tailored for city commuting scenarios, while the upgraded quick-release battery design allows you to effortlessly remove the battery with a simple turn of the key. The redesigned side keyhole position eliminates the need to bend down to find the keyhole. The EB5 Roamer is Jasion's first model equipped with 26" x 2.25" puncture-resistant tires, with a maximum load capacity of 400 pounds. Its unique fast-charging technology makes it the first Jasion product to fully charge in just 4-5 hours. With an 1100W high-power motor, the EB5 Roamer reaches speeds of up to 28 miles per hour, boasting a range of 50 miles, making urban commuting a breeze! Positioned between the EB7 and X-Hunter in terms of performance, the EB5 Roamer fills a gap in the Jasion product lineup, offering you more purchasing options.

settings.title: What's your shipping policy?
settings.content:
Jasion has suspended local pick-up services in the United States. If pick-up services are resumed, we will update the information on our website. Please check the website for updates.

We provide UPS, USPS, and FedEx shipping services. No tax is needed. We DO NOT ship to PO BOXES.

In-stock orders typically ship within 2 business days, unless otherwise noted on the product page. Please allow 5-7 business days for your shipment to arrive at your address. Any delivery dates provided by JASION are estimates.

For more shipping information, send an email to support@Jasionbike.com. We will get back to you in 24 hours.

Want to know more about shipping policies, please check more details on our Shipping Policy Page.

settings.title: What's your warranty policy?
settings.content:
All JASION bikes carry a one(1) year warranty from the date of receipt of the bike for manufacturing defects in materials and/or workmanship( all free accessories are not covered).

We will replace any component that is defective or damaged in materials and/or workmanship( including the damage in the processing of shipment).

Before making a warranty claim, we suggest that you first contact us at support@jasionbike.com.

Want to know more about warranty policies, please check more details on our Warranty Policy Page.

settings.title: What's your return&refund policy?
settings.content:
We provide exchange service within 14 days. If the product is defective or damaged, Send damaged photos or videos to customer service within 14 days after receiving the goods, and the damaged parts can be replaced or compensated. We will cover the return (exchange) shipping costs.

In the case of non-quality returns, the customer will be responsible for the return shipping costs.

You can always contact us for any return questions at support@jasionbike.com.

Want to know more about return and refound policies, please check more details on our Return&Refund Policy Page.

settings.title: Do you support US local pickup?
settings.content:
Certainly! Please check the warehouse information here.
(Address: DAO_CA_US 1001 South Doubleday Ave, DOCK#19, Ontario, CA 91761)
If you choose to pick it up, please contact our customer service support@jasionbike.com first. Please pick it up from the warehouse within two days since you receive BOL, or the order will be voided. You will need to pay the warehouse placement fee (depends on order)

settings.title: Does my height suit EB5 Roamer?
settings.content: The recommended rider height is 5'2"-6'6".
